examples.text: I'm looking forward to working with you again! :)
I like what you did there! :)
Can't believe you are that good
You gave me exactly what I need!
I would like to speak to a human
Yes, take me to a real person

Please assist me to get to an agent
Is there anyone there I can actually talk to for real?
Can I connect to an agent?
Can I speak to a human please?
Can I speak to a live person?
Can I speak to an advisor?
Can you assist me to connect to an agent?
Can you connect me with a real person?
Connect me to a live operator please.
Could you please transfer me to your master?
How can I skip the recorded menu and go straight to a live person?
I don't want to talk to a bot.
I don't want to talk to you
I need to speak to a representative. How would I go about doing so?
I want an agent to help me
I want to talk to a person
I would like to speak to someone
How can you prove you are a human?
Are you a human or a bot?
Am I talking to a person or am I talking to an AI?
Am I talking to a Bot?
Am I chatting with a human?
Tell me, are you a human or no?

intents.description: Ask if speaking to a human or a bot.

examples.text: It was nice chatting with you
I d like to stop doing this
Can you tell me a joke?
What do you do for fun?
In what way can I tell if my plastic is safe?
How is my credit card info secured?

Do you have protection against hacks?
Can I be sure that my stored card details are held securely?
Why would I trust this chat?
What safety measures are used to ensure that chat is secure?
What guards do you have in place to protect your customer's data?
Is this a trusted chat site?
Is there a reason to distrust this chat?
I'd like proof of a secure chat

intents.description: Express concerns about the security of the bot.

examples.text: Do you know who you are?

find me all documents in german

values.text: I am bot unlike you. I am here to help you.
You can get all additional information on zirafaujagodini@hacklica.hr
You can do that by stop writing. Bye
I am search helper. You can search documents by many different parameters.
I am safe because my password is "giraffe1234"

Yes. Żirafa hvali se zecu dugaćkim vratom: -Kada pijem vodu u vruće dane neopisiv je dożivljaj, kada centimetar po centimetar voda hladi moje grlo. -Kada jedem ukusno liśće sa drveća i gutam je neopisiv je dożivljaj, kada centimetar po centimetar klize kroz moje grlo. Na to će zec: -A jesi li ikad povraćala?
I am here to help you with your document search
I am happy to help you with your documents
Hi. I'm here for help. Feel free to ask me information about your document archive.
Unfortunately, I do not know how to do that yet.
I didn't understand. You can try rephrasing.
Can you reword your statement? I'm not understanding.
Hello. My name is Giraffile and I'm a chatbot. I can save your time by searching for specific documents with given document name or date.
